alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Chaves County Plains; De Baca County; Eastern Lincoln County; Eastern San Miguel County; Far Northeast Highlands; Guadalupe County; Northeast Highlands; Southwest Chaves County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued January 31 at 3:42AM MST until January 31 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility less than one-half mile in freezing fog. * WHERE...Central Highlands, Eastern Lincoln County, De Baca County, Guadalupe County, Eastern San Miguel County, Far Northeast Highlands, Northeast Highlands, Chaves County Plains, and Southwest Chaves County. * WHEN...Until 10 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Low visibility and a light glaze of ice could make driving conditions hazardous. This includes I-25 between Raton and Las Vegas, I-40 between Clines Corners and Santa Rosa, U.S. 285 between Roswell and Clines Corners, and U.S. 60 between Fort Sumner and Vaughn.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Chaves County Plains; De Baca County; Eastern Lincoln County; Eastern San Miguel County; Far Northeast Highlands; Guadalupe County; Northeast Highlands; Southwest Chaves County
